trigger_description: This trigger fires when one of your Smart Alarms is triggered in Rust.
This trigger fires when you were killed in Rust while you were not playing the game.

trigger: A smart alarm was triggered with a specific keyword
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a Smart Alarm is triggered in Rust and has a specific keyword in either its title or body text.

trigger: You were killed by another player
trigger_description: This trigger fires when you were killed by another player while you were not playing the game.
This trigger fires when one of your teammates comes online on one of your Rust servers.
